paper_abstract: In this paper we study extensions of the arithmetic operators +, -, ., divided by to the lattice L(1) of closed subintervals of the unit interval. Starting from a minimal set of axioms that these operators must fulfill, we investigate which properties they satisfy. We also investigate some classes of t-norms on L(1) which can be generated using these operators; these classes provide natural extensions of the Lukasiewicz, product, Frank, Schweizer-Sklar and Yager t-norms to L(1). (c) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Generalized arithmetic operators and their relationship to t-norms in interval-valued fuzzy set theory
